sentences.en: Dario played the sonata with great finesse.
sentences.cn: 达里奥以高超的技艺弹奏了这首奏鸣曲。

sentences.en: I still have the heart finesse to fall back on.
It was a disappointing performance which lacked finesse.
sentences.cn: 那场演出缺乏技巧,令人失望.

sentences.en: It's not as easy as it looks. You need finesse, not strength.
sentences.cn: 这并不是看上去那么容易. 你需要的是技巧, 不是力量.

sentences.en: It's not as easy as tit looks. You need finesse, not strength.
sentences.cn: 这并不是看上去那么容易, 你需要的是技巧, 而不是力量.

sentences.en: Lillian Hellman's plays are marked by insight and finesse.
sentences.cn: 莉莲.赫尔曼的巨作从富有洞察力和写作技巧著称.

sentences.en: Paul played the sonata with great finesse.
sentences.cn: 保罗以丰富的技巧弹奏了这部奏鸣曲.

sentences.en: Playing bridge , we make some probability estimate before attempting a finesse.
sentences.cn: 打桥牌时, 在采取某种策略之前,总要先做一些概率估计.

sentences.en: Supplement Courtesy Campaign with a Finesse Campaign.
sentences.cn: 把礼貌运动进一步提升为“注重修养”的运动.

sentences.en: The adroit prosecutor arranged his questions with admirable finesse.
sentences.cn: 那机灵的检查官以令人赞赏的手法安排他的问题.
那位画家展现了高超的手法.

sentences.en: The pilots demonstrated their finesse by doing barrel rolls above the crowds.
sentences.cn: 这些飞行员在观众头顶表演了滚桶特技,以此显示自己的驾驶技术.

sentences.en: The wine has great finesse a particular softness imparted by the Merlot.
sentences.cn: 这款葡萄酒非常细腻,尤其是美乐赋予的柔软.

sentences.en: These later books trace her growing finesse and poetic subtlety.
sentences.cn: 那些后来的诗集变得雅致而精细.
略施小计达成一桩交易

sentences.en: You must acquire great finesse of perception.
sentences.cn: 你必须学会洞察事物的高超技巧.

trans.tran_cn: 手腕，手段，技巧，策略，纤细，偷牌
trans.tran_en: if you do something with finesse, you do it with a lot of skill and style

trans.tran_cn: 巧妙处理；以偷牌方式先出
trans.tran_en: to handle a situation well, but in a way that is slightly deceitful

trans.tran_cn: 巧妙处理，以偷牌方式先出，施巧计，[牌]偷牌
